Header: Beragala accident: heroic bus driver saves lives of passengers
Content: The death toll in yesterday's bus accident in Beragala has risen to two with the death of the driver of the bus. Police said that the driver has lost control of the bus after its break system collapsed while the bus was descending a slope. Then the driver without thinking of his own life has turned the bus towards a boulder to stop the bus. However, 25 persons including him sustained injuries in the accident. Later, 2 persons including the bus driver succumbed to their injuries.
